name: Pharaoh's Serpent
description:
Evil forces are trying to bring the temple down. You're the god of war! Defend the temple from the continuous attacks of the mummies.

Your life is bound to the life of your serpent. You must control its wavy movement to guided to food and help it survive as long as possible.

A multitasking game in which you have to control the snake's movement and defend against attacking enemy waves.
